name: Legend 64
summary: Legend 64 is an adventure game, with N64-inspired visuals, where you fight ghosts and undead monsters. Your most precious possession is stolen after you become hopelessly lost inside a mysterious forest, and with nothing but your courage and determination, you embark on a quest to retrieve it. You won't be facing the spirit world alone, however, as you've got a ghost friend to help you across your journey. Together with your companion, the wayward soul named Ember, the two of you must traverse the haunted depths of the demonic castle to recover what you've both lost. Will you survive, or become another permanent resident?
